title._content: "Glen Oaks," James Hobart Moore house, East Valley Road, Montecito, California. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Glen Oaks," James Hobart Moore house, East Valley Road, Montecito, California. Pathway] [1917 spring] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Myron Hunt. Landscape: W. Stanley Davis, gardener until 1916. Associated Name: Lora Small (Mrs. James H.) Moore. Other: James Hobart Moore acquired the house, then known as "Field Place, from its original owners, Dr. Alexander Blair Thaw and Mrs. Florence Daw Thaw, in 1906. Today: Garden not extant. Slide used with lecture "California Gardens" as no. 54. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16057 Call Number: LC-J717-X97- 58
